resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Includes in

[https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/registry_internal.h]

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/registry.cc

should be in alphabetical order
fields.summary: [C++] Includes should be in alphabetical order
